name: Supremo Plastics

idea:
ProTec Concepts Private Limited was formed in December 2015 with the purpose of bringing Innovation and Innovative services in the every day lives of common people across the globe, bringing high value addition at the most disruptive pricing. 

We own US Patents in Zirconia and are in research for anti-cancer sunscreens, healthcare devices and services.

Our Zirconia Patent of Discs and Coloring Liquids have reached commercial use stage in dentistry and healthcare.

VISION 

To introduce advanced technology superior product at affordable prices 

To create and sustain leadership position in India and leverage it globally 

To explore related market opportunities for other products – locally & globally.

STRATEGIC POSITIONING 

ProTec enjoys definite advantage from its unique process for producing PATENTED PROTEC Zirconia Discs,

Advanced Technology Zirconia at Affordable Prices” 

Our Patented ProTec Zirconia Discs are the best in world with relative comparisons being Published In International Scientific Journal’s and Magazines including “The Dental Advisor” of United States.

This Patented ProTec Zirconia can in future be used in the manufacturing of Zirconia Dental Implants, Zirconia Hip Implants, Zirconia Implants, Prefabricated Paediatric Zirconia Crown’s as Well as other Prefabricated Healthcare Devices across healthcare.

This Patented Zirconia can also be used with further modifications and it’s better capabilities in the Manufacturing of Imitation Jewellery, Automobile Industry and Aerospace industries.

Time frame to begin production = 120-150 Days After Placing Order for Equipments including 45-60 (Approximately Two Months) to ensure consistent quality of Zirconia Discs.

INVESTMENT 

We need One Time Project Funding of ₹ 21 Crores for purchase of equipment's and six months Working Capital, after which we can fund ourselves and even return the Investment back in 18-24 Month's. We are only focussing on achieving 0.02% market share at disruptive pricing in Indian Dentistry segment in the first year. Any further capacity addition, research and growth will be through earnings. 66

In a phase wise Investment, first tranche of ₹ 3-4 Crores would also be sufficient with further fund raises subsequently. Though One Time funding would be more helpful in achieving the full potential of the commercially viable Product.

FUTURE OPPORTUNITIES 

It’s an open global market worth 5 billion USD for us to explore with our US FDA & CE approved patented Zirconia Discs. Covering Zirconia uses across all spectrum, It’s a 300 Billion USD market to capture substantial percentage market share in it.

name: INCLOV TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our introductory product is Essens Soluble Fibre. This is for the first time in India that we bring to you, in table top application, NUTRIOSE® soluble fibre which is globally best-in-class, 100% wheat dextrin powder. This product is 100% plant based, made in France and has been clinically proven to provide health benefits.

You might wonder why did we chose to focus on dietary fibres. Well, the answer is simple. According to National Institute of Nutrition (Indian Council of Medical Research) “Dietary fibre delays the intestinal transit of the food consumed. Dietary fibre is important for proper bowel function, to reduce chronic constipation, diverticular disease, haemorrhoids coronary heart diseases, diabetes and obesity. They also reduce plasma cholesterol. The protective role of dietary fibre against colon cancer has long been recognised.”
name: ESSENS WELLNESS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Sir, We supply New Genuine, OEM, Replacement, and Remanufactured Parts.      

 

Industries We Serve

 

* Oil & Gas Industry

* Refinery & Petrochemical Industry

* Chemical & Fertilizers Industry

* Pharmaceutical Industry

* Metal & Steel Industry

* Power Industry

* Paint & Plastic Industry

* Food & Dairy Industry

 

Apart of this we are suppliers of. 

*Automobile Spares & Accessories, for all types of vehicles, eg. Sadan Cars,SUV, All type of Trucks & Buses. 

 

The different types of Auto spare parts are:

Auto Electrical Parts, Transmission Parts, Clutch, Nuts & Bolts, Engine Parts, Air Condition parts,Brake Parts & Rubber Components. 

 

*Air & Gas Compressor Parts & Accessories for Reciprocating, Piston Compressors.Rotary Screw Compressors.Rotary Vane

Compressors.

 

SPS GLOBAL can arrange hundreds of replacement Ingersoll Rand Centac air compressor parts from the hard-to-find, to the most common, including air filters, air/oil separators, and oil filters as well as complete rebuild kits and individual spare parts.

 

SPS GLOBAL supplies Industrial valves of various types such as Gate Valves, Globe Valves, Ball Valves, Butterfly Valves, Check Valves, Pressure Valves, and Diaphragm Valves etc. 

 

SPS GLOBAL supplies an extensive range of replacement industrial grade rotary parts including rotary compressor controls, coolers, coupling elements, gaskets, gauges, shaft seals, pressure valves, and more.

 

Browse quality rotary replacement parts for major OEMs including Ingersoll Rand, Gardner Denver, Sullair, Atlas Copco, Joy, and more.
